title: Could we have Braum ward hop to wards that are being attacked by enemies?
body: {{champion:201}} : I will protect this ward with my life

replies.body: I think that if Braum could ward hop it should only be to wards placed by teammates. I feel this would fit thematically for Braum since he could hop to his ally's ward to get to him faster and it would avoid the problem of Braum holding his wards.

1. Your post belongs to M@G
2. If serious, give some context. I personally find {{champion:201}} pretty balanced right now.
